item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I am Ankit Sharma and I work as an Machine Learning Engineer. My interests range from reading fiction, study science, machine learning and building on Apple platforms.

item.title: Now
item.description: What I am doing now? Work I am working as a Software Engineer in a startup, OnionDev Tech (Gram vaani). My work involves around writing Django Apps to training and deploying Machine Learning models. Current project: To make an QnA System from unstructured data where a farmer can ask anything about his/her crops over an IVR system. Learning I am completing the fast.ai course on practical deep learning for coders.
